text: Oooh thats awesome, I love zero. You should test out some thickness and making it a light source for a more energy feel, that's always the vibe I got from Zeros sabre, even in the GBA games :smiley:

I love that question, in the simplest way, because I can't imagine myself doing anything else. When I was a teenager I'd spend hours animating silly things and bringing characters to life. It's corny but it was that feeling of belonging that I can't find in any other type of work.
Is there anything that brings that feeling to you right now?
I would everything at the moment, more so animation, script writing and coding .
